experience_assessment: I do not know much about this area.
review_assessment:_checking_correctness_: I did not assess the derivations or theory.
I did not assess the experiments.
title: Official Blind Review #2
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I made a quick assessment of this paper.
review:
The authors present and analyze a quantum computing algorithm for learning GMMs.

I think this paper cannot be accepted because it violates formatting guidelines. Also, I think it is not appropriate for ICLR since it assumes knowledge of quantum computing that most people at this conference would not have, and I as a reviewer do not possess, and hence cannot evaluate this paper. For example, I do not know bra-ket notation.

If the ACs disagree, I am happy to revise my review for this paper and try to be more thorough.
